title: NRRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Laboratory Assistant and Other Posts
description: The National Rice Research Institute (NRRI) has released the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Research Associates, Project Associates, and  Laboratory Assistants. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Tech, M.Sc, Post Graduation, B.Sc, and Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NRRI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and application fee, and how to apply for these posts is menti...
